analysis.description:
AbstractSale.withdraw (/unique_chucks/12/0x7acbc0b5c51027dc659a19f257bb3e462309b626.sol#277-291) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- _to.transfer(_value) (/unique_chucks/12/0x7acbc0b5c51027dc659a19f257bb3e462309b626.sol#284)
AbstractSale.toBytes20 (/unique_chucks/12/0x7acbc0b5c51027dc659a19f257bb3e462309b626.sol#271-277) is declared view but contains assembly code

Eticket4Sale (/unique_chucks/12/0x7acbc0b5c51027dc659a19f257bb3e462309b626.sol#338-404) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/12/0x7acbc0b5c51027dc659a19f257bb3e462309b626.sol#395-404)

PreSale.getTimeBonus (/unique_chucks/12/0x7acbc0b5c51027dc659a19f257bb3e462309b626.sol#421-432) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- interval == 0
	- interval == 1
	- interval == 2 || interval == 3
	- interval == 2 || interval == 3

ERC20ReceiveAdapter.receive (/unique_chucks/12/0x7acbc0b5c51027dc659a19f257bb3e462309b626.sol#174-183) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(msg.sender,this,_value) (/unique_chucks/12/0x7acbc0b5c51027dc659a19f257bb3e462309b626.sol#180-182)

AbstractSale.withdraw (/unique_chucks/12/0x7acbc0b5c51027dc659a19f257bb3e462309b626.sol#277-291) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-Token(_token).transfer(_to,_value) (/unique_chucks/12/0x7acbc0b5c51027dc659a19f257bb3e462309b626.sol#285)

MintingSale.doPurchase (/unique_chucks/12/0x7acbc0b5c51027dc659a19f257bb3e462309b626.sol#313-318) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(buyer,sold.add(bonus)) (/unique_chucks/12/0x7acbc0b5c51027dc659a19f257bb3e462309b626.sol#315-318)

Reentrancy in Eticket4Sale.transfer (/unique_chucks/12/0x7acbc0b5c51027dc659a19f257bb3e462309b626.sol#395-404):
	External calls:
	- doPurchase(beneficiary,amount,0) (/unique_chucks/12/0x7acbc0b5c51027dc659a19f257bb3e462309b626.sol#399)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- cap (/unique_chucks/12/0x7acbc0b5c51027dc659a19f257bb3e462309b626.sol#401-403)

Reentrancy in Eticket4Sale.transferWithBonus (/unique_chucks/12/0x7acbc0b5c51027dc659a19f257bb3e462309b626.sol#387-395):
	External calls:
	- doPurchase(beneficiary,amount,bonus) (/unique_chucks/12/0x7acbc0b5c51027dc659a19f257bb3e462309b626.sol#390-394)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- cap (/unique_chucks/12/0x7acbc0b5c51027dc659a19f257bb3e462309b626.sol#395)

AbstractSale.toBytes20 uses assembly (/unique_chucks/12/0x7acbc0b5c51027dc659a19f257bb3e462309b626.sol#271-277)
	- /unique_chucks/12/0x7acbc0b5c51027dc659a19f257bb3e462309b626.sol#273-277
ReadOnlyToken.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/12/0x7acbc0b5c51027dc659a19f257bb3e462309b626.sol#58)
OwnableImpl.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/12/0x7acbc0b5c51027dc659a19f257bb3e462309b626.sol#45-54) should be declared external

Eticket4Sale.transfer (/unique_chucks/12/0x7acbc0b5c51027dc659a19f257bb3e462309b626.sol#395-404) should be declared external
